notes.note: Fixed a crash when Firefox for Android is put in background

Fixed a crash when using Web Speech ([bug 1513912][0])

[0]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/1513912

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
title: Firefox for Android 64.0.2 Release
